content.description: A new 450-unit housing development will replace several small farms on the outskirts of Fremont. The development will be composed of 1/4-hectare lots with nearly identical footprints, as show below.
content.question: Which of the following will be the greatest impact of the development on the local water supply?

choices.label: There will be less recharge of groundwater.
There will be less runoff to fill reservoirs.
There will be higher humidity in the suburb.
There will be decreased soil exposure, reducing bacteria loads in surface water.
There will be decreased erosion in local streams.

content.answer: There will be less recharge of groundwater.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
